SEARCH
Package com.onlineshopping.api

Class AdminResource

java.lang.Object
com.onlineshopping.api.AdminResource
@Path("/admin") public class AdminResource extends Object
Resource class for admin operations. Provides API classes to fetch all users, all products, specific product details, adding updating and deleting products

      @GET @Path("/getUsers") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getUsers(@Context jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieves all the user details from the database
      Parameters:
      request - Http request containing session information
      Returns:
      A json Response object containing a list of registered users

      Parameters:
      productId - Product ID of the product details to be fetched

      Deletes the product from the database
      Parameters:
      productId - Product ID of the product to be deleted
      Returns:
      A json Response object with status of the action and a message

    • updateProduct

      @PUT @Path("/updateProduct") @Consumes("multipart/form-data") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response updateProduct(@FormParam("productId") int productId, @FormParam("productDescription") String desc, @FormParam("productPrice") double price, InputStream filePart) throws IOException
      Updates details of a product
      Parameters:
      productId - Product ID of the product to be updated
      desc - New product descriptiion for the product
      price - New price for the product
      filePart - New Image for the product
      Returns:
      A json Response object containing the status of the action and a message
      Throws:
      IOException

    • addProduct

      @POST @Path("/addProduct") @Consumes("multipart/form-data") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response addProduct(@FormParam("productName") String name, @FormParam("productDescription") String desc, @FormParam("productPrice") double price, InputStream filePart)
      Add new product to the database
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the product
      desc - Description of the product
      price - Price of the product
      filePart - Image for the product
      Returns:
      A json Response object containing the status of the action and a message
